name: AIL742 Scalable Data Management for ML
description: Sampling and sketching (reservoir sampling, counting samples, graph sampling, count-min sketches, Flajolet sketches, graph sketches, heavy hitters, Johnson-Lindenstrauss lemma and dimensionality reduction techniques); data integration (schema alignment, information extraction, entity linkage, data fusion); data profiling and cleaning (rule-based data cleaning, outlier detection, data transformations, probabilistic data cleaning); issues in building large-scale machine learning models (noise and bias in data, model data management).
pre: COL106, MTL106 or with instructor’s permission.
